subject: Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: ORLANDO, Fla., Dec. 1 (AP) — The Central Florida junior Kevin Smith rushed for 284 yards and 4 touchdowns on Saturday as Central Florida defeated Tulsa, 44-25, for the Conference USA championship.
snippet: ORLANDO, Fla., Dec. 1 (AP) — The Central Florida junior Kevin Smith rushed for 284 yards and 4 touchdowns on Saturday as Central Florida defeated Tulsa, 44-25, for the Conference USA championship.
